response.original_title: The Beatles’ “Yellow Submarine Songtrack” DTS-HD MA
response.overview: Immerse yourself in the vibrant sound of The Beatles’ “Yellow Submarine Songtrack,” now available in DTS-HD Master Audio Surround on Blu-ray. Released in 1999, this album features remixed versions of the songs from the 1968 animated film, including classics like “Yellow Submarine,” “All You Need Is Love,” and "Hey Bulldog". The album replaces George Martin’s orchestral score with additional Beatles tracks, offering a comprehensive musical journey through their psychedelic era. With DTS-HD MA Surround, every note and harmony is delivered with stunning precision, enveloping you in a rich, multi-dimensional audio experience. The high-definition audio format preserves the intricate arrangements and pioneering recording techniques, offering an immersive listening experience for audiophiles and Beatles fans alike.  A Psychedelic Voyage! Rediscover “Yellow Submarine” and embark on a sonic journey through the album that continues to enchant listeners.
response.title: The Beatles’ “Yellow Submarine Songtrack” DTS-HD MA
